group.post_content: The Fields contained in a museum
Contains options as to whether or not to display like, comment, and sharing options on a particular post.
Custom fields for the component level

field.description: A picture of the museum
field.name: Museum Picture

field.description: The URL for the media. This could be an image or a video

url.message: Please enter a valid URL address

field.name: Media URL

field.description: The type of the media: image or video
field.name: Media Type
Prices
field.description: The Costs of Admission for the Museum
A list of prices of admission to the museum
field.name: Prices
Map
field.description: Link to a Map of a Museum

field.name: Image
field.description: A Picture for the opening screen of the museum app

field.name: Website
field.description: A link to the website

field.name: Phone
field.description: The phone number of museum

field.name: Email
field.description: The museum\'s email address

field.name: Description
field.description: Gives the full description of the exhibit

field.name: Exhibit Image
field.description: Intro Picture (1050px x 600px)

field.name: Component image
field.description: Image should be 1050x600

field.name: Enable Text Sharing for this Post?
field.__types_title: Enable Text Sharing for this Post?

field.name: Enable Image Sharing for this Post?
field.__types_title: Enable Image Sharing for this Post?

field.name: Post Image
field.description: image should be 1050x600

field.name: Section
field.description: What section of the component the post belongs to

field.name: Min Age
field.description: Minimum age recommendation

field.name: Max Age
field.description: Maximum age recommendation

field.name: Age Range
field.description:
Recommendation for post age range. Select all that apply. None selected will be treated as all selected.
Note: Any change here must also be included in the tailored content categories on the museum level!

field.name: Tailored Content Categories
field.description:
Contains a list of content filtering tags delineated by a | (pipe).
Note: Any change here must also be included in the filter checklist on the post level!

field.name: Description
field.description: Gives the full description of the exhibit

field.name: Order Number
field.description: The order you want the content/section/post/component/exhibit to appear

field.name: Sort Order
field.description: Educators don\'t need to worry about setting the sort order

field.name: Homepage Icon
field.description: Image can be any dimension; 858 x 836 pixels works well

field.name: Post body
field.description: The main text of the post

field.name: Post Header Type
field.description: Whether the post header is a video or a photo (photo should be 1050x600)

field.name: Post Header Content URL
field.description: Video or Image URL; image should be 1050x600

field.name: Hide in Kiosk Mode
field.description: Mark if you want to exclude from kiosk mode

field.name: Post preview text
field.description: The text will be seen in the post preview

type.description: All the components for a given exhibit
A segment of the museum that contains all the components related to a specific scientific topic.
The \"post\" level of a component: big question, activity, what do I do, etc
